name: Frontier Old Fashioned
preparation:
The Old Fashioned’s traditional mix of bourbon, simple syrup and bitters is as simple as it seems. But it results in a complex and refreshing cocktail when you use bourbon as good as Bulleit.

Add all ingredients into an Old Fashioned glass with ice and stir gently until the level of the ice and liquid are the same.

Zest an orange peel over the glass and add the peel to the drink as a garnish.
